description: This file is a header (.h) file that declares exported function prototypes related to a Web Server/Client/Application implementation, specifically for Web Simple Server objects. It contains function declarations for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing Web SSO (Single Sign-On) objects.

methods.name: WebCreateSimpleServer
methods.description: Creates a Web Simple Server object with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: WebSsoCreate
methods.description: Creates a Web SSO object with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: WebSsoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into a Web SSO object.
